Class ArticleUntaggedEventArgs

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models.Events
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Event arguments for the OnArticleUntagged event. Carries data related to a tag being removed from an article.

public class ArticleUntaggedEventArgs : EventArgs

public ArticleUntaggedEventArgs(int articleId, int tagId, string tagName)

Parameters

articleId int

The unique identifier of the article from which the tag was removed.

tagId int

The unique identifier of the tag that was removed.

tagName string

The name of the tag that was removed.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if tagName is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if articleId or tagId is less than or equal to 0.
